unnormalised: Borem, mhaka dista, mhojem lhan bhurgem, Arjunak, fattim satolleak tap ailo. 102°F! Mhaka khub bhirant disli. Poilech fautt ami mai zalean, sogllem CODE RED situation bhaxen dista, tuka khobor asa? Tannem taka Rainbow Children's Hospitalantlea Dr. Mehra kodden veglloch dhavddo. Hanvem aikollam ti Bangaloreantle vhoddle bhurgeanchim doctor.
normalised: Borem, mhonnlear, mhojea dhakttolea Arjunak pirailem gele pottlea sumanant. ek xem ani don digri farenhait! Mhaka puro tras zalo. Poilea pavttim maaim zaun, soglleak C-O-D-E R-E-D poris lagta, tuka khobor asa? Dhampakuch Rainbow Children's Hospitalache Doktor Mehrak vhelem. Aikolam ti Bangalorechi boreantli bore bhurgeanchi doctor mhonn.

unnormalised: Distam, viral tap bhurgeam modem khub sadharan, khas korun pausachea tempar. Dr. Mehran mhollem, "Bhirant naka! He sadharan vostu asli asteli." Tinnem sangonk sompem! Tinnem Arjunachi boren porikxa keli, tachem gollso, tache kan - soglleanchem pollelem. Tachea vaccinationachea schedule vixim puroslem. Mhakai yad keli taka 15/10/2024 ier MMR vaccine diunk zai mhunn. Te roddpache sessionak toyar zaunk zai, nixttanem.
normalised: Dislem mhonnlear, viral piraillo bhurgeam modim sadharanponnan dista, khas korun pausalleachea kallant. Doktor Mehra mhonnlem, "Bhivonk naka! Tem sadharanponnachim vostu asunk xakta." Tika sangonk sopem! Tinnem Arjunachi bori bhaxen topas keli, tachem gholo polloilem, tache kan - soglle vostu. Tinnem tache tika kortaleachem velapatrakui vicharlem. Mhaka ugddas dilem taka pandhra october don hojar vis chovisaver M-M-R tiki divpak asa mhonn. Azun dukhanche boske khatir toyar zaunk zai, huuum.

unnormalised: Tinnem Calpol 250mg syrup dor 6 horanim diunk sanglam zor tap 100°F udentlem tor. Ani khub udok diunk sanglam! Narlachem udok, dal paani, tuvem nam dovrunk zatat. Khorench sangonk, taka hydrated dovrunk zai. Tinnem ani ek sanglolem kitem mhonn tor dusrea lakxananche polleunk, zoxem kuxil zali tor vo suskav divnk problem zale tor, kiteak zaito porimanni tap aslelem vorvim zaina mhunn. Kuxil zali nam, devak dhanyavad.
normalised: Tinnem Calpol don xem ani ponnas miligram syrup dor ek so ho'ramni divpak sangilem piraillo ek xem digri farenhait poros vaddlo zalear. Ani zaitea toll vostu! Narlachim udok, dall paani, tuka tem sangta. Mukhya rupan, taka toll dhorunk kitem tori. Tinnem ani thoddem sangolem dusrea lakxhonnacher nodor dovrunk zoxem angar uthon vo dhovornneak tras, kitem tori piraillo sadharan poros chodd asli zalear. Angar uthon nam, Devan dhanyavad.

unnormalised: Soglleant vaitt kitem? Arjun kitem khai naslo! Taka tachem sadharan dal chawal naka asli. Taka fokot hugot diunk zai asli. Mai cheo kartavech teuch aslitan, kiteak? Fattlea 2 diusanche mhaka fokot tachea lagin bosunk poddlem, tacho temp polleunk poddlem. Dor 2 horanim, dhyanan mandun ghetlem, mhaka dista ami medical professional aslam bhaxen. Tantum kamak ek khell aslo.
normalised: Sogleant vaait bhag? Arjunak kitem khaunk nam! Aplem sadharan dall chawal naka mhonnlem. Fakth cuddonk zai mhonnlem. Maaimchi seva bore bhaxen, kai? Pottleache don dis fakth tachem vatten bosun, tacho tapman topasun kaddle. Dor ek don ho'ramni, niyallponnan nond kelim, zoxem hanv ek vaidyakiya vyavsayik astalom. Tem thodem bhrasht aslem.

unnormalised: Tisrea diusak, tap nimano zavnk laglem. Sukha! Tannem tachem favorite khichdiche thodde kornnem khaunk mellolem. Zait! Dr. Mehran mhaka CBC korunk sanglam kitlek bacterial infection vochunk sanglam mhunn, ani te report-ui normal ailem. Sogllem borem asa.
normalised: Tisrea disan, piraillo chukonk lagli. Tras kam zalo! Tannem thodem aaplim avddi khichdi khai. Jikhlem! Doktor Mehra-n C-B-C kortoleakui sangolem kitem tori bacteria che infection zaunk xakti mhonn dakhovnk, mhonnun to report normal aslo. Soglem borem.

unnormalised: Mhaka chintunk laglem, khorench sangonk, kitle vegim te lhan bhurgeam vostunche dhortat mhunn. Te soglle khelachea tempar ani parkant vetolean tankam khub germanche expose zatat. Ami hat dhuvnk zai ani vostu nirmoll dovrunk zai. Ami ek nirmollem sanitizer gheunk zai?
normalised: Tem mhaka dakoilem, punn, he dhakttole vostu kitlench vegim dhorpak xakti mhonn. Te sogle khellkuddache vostu ani parka veti tem tankam soglle toreche germs dakoita. Hat dhuvpak ani vostu nirmoll dovrunk chodd chouks asunk zai. Ek borem sanitizer ghevpak zai kai?

unnormalised: Ani, majhi salah dusrea novea mai bapaink: bhirant naka (sangonk sompem, hanv zannam!). Tuja kallzachi uloupachi porva kor, tujea bhurgeamcher lakx dovrunk zai, ani ek pediatrician sodh zachi tuka bhakri dista, zoxem Dr. Mehra. Ani dorvelear, DORVELEAR, Calpol toyar dovrunk zai! Tenem maji jivit rakunk adhar kelo.
normalised: Tori, mhoji budh dusrea novea maaim bapaik: bhivonk naka (sangonk sopem, mhaka khobor asa!). Tumi tumchea monancher bhavarth dhorat, tumchea bhurgecher niyallponnan topas korat, ani tumchea doctoracho bhavarth dhorat, Doktor Mehra poris. Ani sodaym, A-L-W-A-Y-S, Calpol hatant dovrat! Tem jivitak rakhunk ek sadhan zala.

unnormalised: Ani yad dovrunk zai, hem-ui vochun zatolem. Tankam feren furniture cher chodunk melltolem ani kamnak khell kornar mhaka bhakri asa. Fokot te hugot divnk tempar sambhallun dovrunk zai! Atam, Arjunachem vaccination appointment bokay korunk voitan, mhaka subh kamna diun!
normalised: Ani ugddas dovrat, hemui choltolen. Te fernaichera vellyar choltolen ani vegim dharvondhi utponn kortolen, mhojer bhavarth dovrat. Tankam cuddon kitlea mhaishank tankam melunk meltole te sanmann karat! Ata, Arjunak tiki kortoleachem appoint ment kortoleak vetam, mhaka borem magat!
